languages.text: "Леди Кассия, рядом с вами я становлюсь безрассудным. И потому прошу принять мои пылкие чувства как дар, равный вашему".

traits.locale_text: "Леди Кассия, рядом с вами я становлюсь безрассудным. И потому прошу принять мои пылкие чувства как дар, равный вашему".

languages.text: "Lady Cassia, being near you has made me reckless. And thus I ask you to accept my ardent feeling as a gift equal to yours."
languages.original_text: "Леди Кассия, рядом с вами я становлюсь безрассудным. И потому прошу принять мои пылкие чувства как дар, равный вашему".

traits.locale_text: "Lady Cassia, being near you has made me reckless. And thus I ask you to accept my ardent feeling as a gift equal to yours."
"Lady Cassia, being near you has made me reckless. And thus I ask you to accept my ardent feeling as a gift equal to yours."
"Lady Cassia, being near you has made me reckless. And thus I ask you to accept my ardent feeling as a gift equal to yours."
"Lady Cassia, being near you has made me reckless. And thus I ask you to accept my ardent feeling as a gift equal to yours."

languages.text: «Lady Cassia, estar junto a usted me ha vuelto imprudente. Por eso me atreveré a pedirle que acepte mi enfervorecida pasión como un regalo que espero esté a la altura del suyo».
languages.original_text: "Lady Cassia, being near you has made me reckless. And thus I ask you to accept my ardent feeling as a gift equal to yours."

traits.locale_text: «Lady Cassia, estar junto a usted me ha vuelto imprudente. Por eso me atreveré a pedirle que acepte mi enfervorecida pasión como un regalo que espero esté a la altura del suyo».

languages.text: 「レディ・カシア、君の側にいることで私は無鉄砲になってしまった。だから、私の熱い思いを、君がくれたものと同等の贈り物として受け取ってほしい」
languages.original_text: "Lady Cassia, being near you has made me reckless. And thus I ask you to accept my ardent feeling as a gift equal to yours."

traits.locale_text: 「レディ・カシア、君の側にいることで私は無鉄砲になってしまった。だから、私の熱い思いを、君がくれたものと同等の贈り物として受け取ってほしい」

languages.text: “卡西娅，光是在你身边，我就会变得冲动不已。因此，我请求你接受我炽热的感情，把它当做等价的回礼。”
languages.original_text: "Lady Cassia, being near you has made me reckless. And thus I ask you to accept my ardent feeling as a gift equal to yours."

traits.locale_text: “卡西娅，光是在你身边，我就会变得冲动不已。因此，我请求你接受我炽热的感情，把它当做等价的回礼。”

languages.text: « Dame Cassia, votre présence à mes côtés m'a {mf|rendu imprudent|rendue imprudente}. Je vous demande donc de bien vouloir accepter ma passion comme un cadeau égal au vôtre. »
languages.original_text: "Lady Cassia, being near you has made me reckless. And thus I ask you to accept my ardent feeling as a gift equal to yours."

traits.locale_text: « Dame Cassia, votre présence à mes côtés m'a {mf|rendu imprudent|rendue imprudente}. Je vous demande donc de bien vouloir accepter ma passion comme un cadeau égal au vôtre. »

languages.text: "Lady Cassia, in Eurer Nähe zu sein, hat mich fahrlässig werden lassen. Und ich bitte Euch daher, meine glühenden Gefühle als Geschenk von gleichem Wert wie das Eure zu akzeptieren."
languages.original_text: "Lady Cassia, being near you has made me reckless. And thus I ask you to accept my ardent feeling as a gift equal to yours."

traits.locale_text: "Lady Cassia, in Eurer Nähe zu sein, hat mich fahrlässig werden lassen. Und ich bitte Euch daher, meine glühenden Gefühle als Geschenk von gleichem Wert wie das Eure zu akzeptieren."

languages.text: "Leydi Cassia, seninle yakınlaşmak beni pervasız birine dönüştürdü. Bu yüzden de seninkinin denginde bir hediye olarak içimdeki ateşli hisleri kabul etmeni istiyorum."
languages.original_text: "Lady Cassia, being near you has made me reckless. And thus I ask you to accept my ardent feeling as a gift equal to yours."

traits.locale_text: "Leydi Cassia, seninle yakınlaşmak beni pervasız biri hâline getirdi. Bu yüzden de seninkinin denginde bir hediye olarak içimdeki ateşli hisleri kabul etmeni istiyorum."
